name: Kidblock TV
description:
Play in a world made of blocks where you are the invincible creator. Choose your texture pack, build and craft with unlimited resources. Every world you create begins with a starter house, a pet, and some natives to keep you company. Explore your world and find all six hidden fortresses. Fight mobs with swords, lasers and rocket launchers.

Check us out at YouTube.com/KidblockApp or Facebook.com/KidblockApp
